title: I was banned from the hCaptcha accessibility account for not being blind (2023)
dot:
digraph hCaptchaWarning{node[shape=box, style="rounded, filled", fontname="Helvetica", fontsize=12];warning[label="Main Warning: Don't Trust Inaccessible Workarounds", shape=ellipse, width=2, style="filled", fillcolor="#ffcc00"];hcWarning[label="hCaptcha intentionally inaccessible
for blind users", shape=box, style="filled", fillcolor="#f8d7da"];accessibilityIssue[label="Accessibility Workaround: Special Account
(only works for blind users)", shape=box, style="filled", fillcolor="#f1f1f1"];breakdown[label="Support Mishandling
Ban for False Claim of Not Being Blind", shape=box, style="filled", fillcolor="#d1ecf1"];automatedSolution[label="Forced to Use Automated Captcha Solver", shape=box, style="filled", fillcolor="#e2e3e5"];endNote[label="Caution: Using inaccessible workarounds is risky", shape=ellipse, width=2, style="filled", fillcolor="#28a745"]; supportEffort[label="Troubleshooting: Attempt to Fix on Brave Browser", shape=box, style="dashed"];supportResponse[label="Support Response: Account Banned
for using accessibility account incorrectly", shape=box, style="dashed"];feedback[label="User Feedback: Misunderstanding about user’s blindness", shape=box, style="dashed"];warning->hcWarning[label="Issue with hCaptcha"];hcWarning->accessibilityIssue[label="No audio captcha"];accessibilityIssue->supportEffort[label="User attempts to fix"];supportEffort->supportResponse[label="Escalates to support"];supportResponse->breakdown[label="Banned account, false claim"];breakdown->automatedSolution[label="User forced to bypass captcha"];automatedSolution->endNote[label="Conclusion: Don’t trust inaccessible workarounds"];feedback->supportResponse[label="Incorrect claim from support"];}

title: A BBC navigation bar component broke depending on the external monitor
dot: digraph bug_investigation{node[shape=box, style=filled, fillcolor=lightblue, fontname="Helvetica"];subgraph cluster_bug{label="Bug Discovery";style=dashed;A1[label="Bug: 'More' button doesn't open menu\nwhen using external monitor at home"];A2[label="Bug only occurs on external monitors"];A3[label="Works fine on laptop screen and on Safari"];}subgraph cluster_reproduction{label="Reproducing the Bug";style=dashed;B1[label="Bug occurs when external monitors positioned above and left of laptop"];B2[label="Bug stops when repositioning external monitors"];}subgraph cluster_investigation{label="Investigation";style=dashed;C1[label="Clue 1: Bug doesn't occur on Safari"];C2[label="Clue 2: Bug occurs with specific monitor setup"];C3[label="Clue 3: Negative screenX and screenY on Chrome/Firefox"];C4[label="Clue 4: screenX and screenY should not be negative"];C5[label="Clue 5: Coordinates treated differently across browsers"];}subgraph cluster_code{label="Bug in Code";style=dashed;D1[label="Problem: isInvokedByMouse() checks for positive screenX/screenY"];D2[label="Solution: Fix check to also account for negative screen coordinates"];D3[label="New check: screenX !== 0 or screenY !== 0"];}subgraph cluster_fix{label="Fix and Conclusion";style=dashed;E1[label="Fix: Update code to handle negative screenX and screenY"];E2[label="Lesson: Be cautious of assumptions in event handling"];E3[label="Refactor planned for future, but bug resolved"];}A1->A2->A3;B1->B2;C1->C2->C3->C4->C5;D1->D2->D3;E1->E2->E3;A3->C1;B2->C2;C5->D1;D3->E1;}
